title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\Intent\Message\LinkOutSuggestion
name: LinkOutSuggestion
description:
The suggestion chip message that allows the user to jump out to the app or website associated with this agent.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.Intent.Message.LinkOutSuggestion

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.destination_name
params.description: Required. The name of the app or site this chip is linking to.

params.name: data.uri
params.description: Required. The URI of the app or site to open when the user taps the suggestion chip.
